testcase.name: Verify Email with out at
testcase.system-out: * configure driver = { type: 'chrome', executable:'C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe', addOptions: ["--remote-allow-origins=*"] } . passed * def site = 'http://127.0.0.1:5173/login' ................................ passed Given driver site ......................................................... passed And input('input[name=email]', 'sevangelistaarkusnexus') .................. passed And input('input[name=password]', 'mipas') ................................ passed When click('{button}Login') ............................................... passed Then waitForText('body', 'Email must contain @.' ).screenshot() ........... passed
